title: Mary's Chicken
ingredients: ['4 chicken thighs', '1 teaspoon of strong mustard', '2 tablespoons of ketchup', '2 sweet oranges', '2 chicken stock cubes', '2 tablespoons of light soy sauce', '2 teaspoons of garlic flakes', '1/2 teaspoon of ground pepper', '4 slices of back bacon', 'butter to cook']
